1.content:
Samuel Alexander was so excited to finally be done moving into his own apartment. He was a 22 year old male with brown hair and eyes, and a decent build. He would no longer have to deal with his sister Heather on an everyday basis. Heather was two years older than Sam and had red hair, blue eyes, and an athletic body. On the other hand he would be able to see his girlfriend, Nora. She was also two years older than Sam, had blonde hair, brown eyes, excellent body, and was working on her doctorate while working at a locally famous diner. They had been going out for two years now and Sam was enjoying life.

Sam had just finished unpacking the last of the boxes and was finally done moving into his new place. He was so excited to be starting a new chapter of his life. All of the sudden, Sam noticed a strange gas coming through the vent, he began to cough, and shortly after he blacked out. He awoke some time later and though it took him a while to regain his bearings he realized that he had shrunk. By his estimate he was now three inches tall. "This can't be happening." Sam thought to himself. Just then the door opened and though he could not yet see who it was, Sam knew he had to get her attention.

Who was at the door?
1.title: The Nightmare Starts

choices: Right. He gets to stay alive
Wrong. He will be a part of Nora
11.content:
Sam could make out that it was Nora who entered the apartment. "Hello? Anybody here?" she asked. Sam ran towards her and tried to get her attention. She did not see him and made her way into the kitchen. Sam ran after her and then proceeded to climb the kitchen drawers to get on the counter and get Nora's attention. "Where could he be?" Nora asked herself as she looked around for something to eat. Sam had finally made it onto the counter when Nora placed a plate right next to him, almost knocking him off the counter. Sam regained his balance as Nora started gathering ingredients for a lettuce, tomato, cheese, and pickle sandwich with mayo, mustard, and ketchup. Sam always thought she had weird cravings. Sam climbed onto the plate and started jumping up and down while waving his arms. When Nora come back to the plate to start making her sandwich she noticed Sam and almost fainted. "What in the world happened to you?" she asked. Sam told her the entire story and when it was over Nora picked Sam up and held him to her face. "Listen, Sam," she began, "due to your current circumstances I have two options. One, I can keep you and be your guardian and no one will find out. Two, I can eat you and live my life as I please and no one will find out. Now I want you to guess which option I will pick." Sam was scared now as his life hung in the balance and in timid manner Sam answered, "the first one." "Well," Nora said, "you are......."

Was Sam right or wrong?
11.title: A Win-Lose Situation

choices: Seek Help in the Eating Area
Try To Get Help In The Kitchen
Hitch A Ride On A Waitress
111.content:
"You are right, Sam." Nora said, "I could never hurt you." Nora places Sam in her cleavage and ate her sandwich. After she was done she told Sam that she had to go work the lunch shift at the diner. Nora left the apartment and quickly drove down to the diner where she rushed inside, put on her uniform and told Sam to keep down. Sam put his head down and eventually fell asleep. Nora was running to and from the kitchen and bumped into another waitress while going to retrieve an order. This bump jarred Sam loose and awakened him. Now Sam was separated from Nora in a busy diner at lunch hour. Sam was still half-awake. He was about halfway between the kitchen and the actual eating area of the diner while numerous waitresses were always rushing past him. He was not short of options.

What course of action did Sam take?
111.title: Lunch Rush

1111.content:
Sam decided he had a better chance in the eating area. He made his way over there and narrowed down his choice of tables to three. The first table had two women around 25. One had black hair while the other had red. They both seemed to be Grad students. The next table had a single female She had long brown hair and looked to be about 23, she had an excellent body and Sam couldn't figure out why she was alone. The third and final table was occupied by two 22 year old. One had blonde hair and green eyes while the other had black hair and blue eyes. All the tables were equal distance away and Sam could get help from any of them.

Which Table did Sam pick?
1111.title: Pick A Table

choices: Bake Sam into the Pie of The Day
Take Sam Home To Cook With
Add Sam To The Next Order
1112.content:
Sam made his way into the kitchen and began climbing the preparation table. Just as he made it to the top a hand grabbed him. "What are you doing here?" said a 26 year old red haired female with green eyes and an excellent body who appeared to be the chef. Sam tried to tell her his story but she wasn't listening. Instead, the chef, whose name was Rose, was wondering how Sam would taste. She made a comment to herself and Sam froze in horror. He pleaded for his life but Rose didn't listen.

What did Rose do?
1112.title: If You Can't Stand The Heat

choices: She gets a piece of the pie, and Sam
11121.content:
"I think you'll fit in perfectly as a secret ingredient." Rose said. Sam struggled and yelled as he was carried over to a pan. He looked down to see it was ready for the oven. The giantess lowered him and carefully added him close to the edge. He couldn't do anything as his body was pressed down to the bottom. The substance held his body down, making it impossible to get free. Though he couldn't see anything, he could feel himself enter the oven. "I envy whoever gets you." Sam could hear barely hear Rose say.

It felt like an eternity in a volcano. The heat stole most of Sam's energy. Sam felt like he was going to burn to death, until he felt movement again. He could hear his prison placed down somewhere and then cut. His piece was lifted, revealing bright light. Sam was able to see the outside world, but the question still remained: could the outside world see him? The shrunken boy and his pie were placed onto a plate and carried out to the customers. Though it was difficult to see, Sam realized that Nora was the one carrying him. However, as he tried to think of a way to get her attention, the plate he was on was set on a table. He could see his customer: a beautiful 29 year old woman with orange hair and a ponytail. Though she was wearing a shirt, her bellybutton was exposed, sending shivers throughout Sam.

"Enjoy." Nora said and left.

"Oh I will." The woman said, getting her deadly fork ready for an attack on her pie.
11121.title: Pye-Pye Sam

choices: Yes. Sam is safe for the moment
No. She has business to take care of
112.content:
"Wrong," Nora said, "looks like you and I will be together forever." Nora started making her sandwich by spreading one slice of bread with mayo and the other with mustard. She then placed a lettuce leaf on top of the slice spread with mayo. Then she placed two pickles on the leaf. Nora then grabbed Sam, laid him on the lettuce leaf, squirted ketchup on him, followed by a slice of cheese, a slice of tomato, and finally the other slice of bread. Sam was frightened at this point. "Any last words?" Nora said. Sam told Nora that he still loved her and that he no regrets. Nora lifted the sandwich to her mouth and took the first bite. Her pearl white teeth cut through the sandwich with ease, just barely missing Sam. Sam watched as Nora chewed and knew that he would be between those crimson lips next. Just as Nora was going in for the next bite, the phone rang.

Does Nora answer the phone?
112.title: Saved By The Ring?

choices: Nora comes back in the kitchen to eat Sam before she leaves....
Nora forgot about him and leaves. Heather visits and sees the sandwich....
1121.content:
{indent"I've got to start unplugging the phone during mealtime," Nora said with a sigh. She got up and went into the living area to answer the phone, with Sam watching her lovely round rear as she walked away. It was a terrifying but interesting situation for Sam, being eaten wasn't exactly on his list of things he wanted to experience. He was at least glad that it was Nora that was going to do it. He knew that he would most likely end up as extra padding on her lovely ass. Though now that Nora was away not paying attention, he decided that he really didn't want to be munched and crunched to death. He thought that if he escaped, he could later, when she might be thinking more clearly, convince her not to eat him. Sam tried to escape, but when he tried to move he couldn't. The ketchup was quite sticky, plus being three inches didn't help; at that size, the ingredients, that were on top of him, were heavy enough to pin him in the sandwich. He stopped struggling, he just had to except that he was going to be lunch. He could hear Nora shouting in the living area, "Are you sure I have to go over to the university today? Why can't I come tomorrow.....okay, I'll be right over."

What happens next?
1121.title: Trying Not To Be Food.

choices: To Nora's apartment to wait for her
11212.content:
Nora quickly left the apartment, totally forgetting about Sam. As she shuts the door, Sam wondered to himself how he was going to get help. Just then Heather came in, and called for Sam. Sam tried to answer but she didn't hear him. She walked into the kitchen and noticed the lonely sandwich. She thought to herself Sam wouldn't mind if she ate it. Heather picked up the Sam sandwich and took a bite. She drew back in disgust. "Nora must have made this sandwich." she concluded as she opened the top slice of bread and peered inside. She gasped as she saw Sam lying there like a condiment in someones lunch. "How could someone do this to you!" Heather asked Sam as she cleaned him off, "Tell me everything." Sam told Heather the whole story and Heather decided she would take Sam with her and go yell at Nora for trying to eat her brother.

Where did Heather go?
11212.title: Sam's Sister Sees the Sam Sandwich

112121.content:
"We really don't have to do this, sis." Sam said, still traumatized from his sandwich experience. "Oh yes we do," Heather said, "no one is going to try to eat my brother." With those words, Heather stuck her little brother in her cleavage and headed towards the University. Heather was going to confront Nora as she was leaving class. Heather arrived at the University and just as Heather entered, the bell rang and a stampede of college students ran by Heather. She was bumped around and Sam flew out of Heather's cleavage due to the impact. Luckily he flew into one of the class rooms, safe from the stampede. Sam knew he would die if he tried to return to Heather. His only hope was that Heather noticed Sam was missing. Just then a hand grabbed Sam.

Who grabbed Sam
112121.title: Stay In School

choices: To her Office to deal with student's problems
1121212.content:
The hand belonged to one of the professors at the University. Sam was raised to the eye level of the professor. "What do we have here?" she said. The professor had blonde hair, green eyes, and the body of a Grecian goddess. Sam tried to tell her his story but she wasn't listening. "My name is Samantha Harris." she said, "You are a tiny person. So I am in control of you. Do not beg, whine or plead. You are mine." Sam had no idea what Samantha had planned for him. Samantha stuck Sam in her cleavage and left the classroom.

Where was Samantha headed?
1121212.title: Teacher's Pet

choices: She sneezes, landing you in Nora's tray.
11212121.content:
As you bounced around in Samantha's cleavage, you couldn't help but think where she was heading. Then you thought about it. She was a professor and she seemed nice enough. Maybe she would take you to a room where she could grow you back to normal? Of course she was. I mean, what were the chances that two women in one day would want to eat him. You chuckled to yourself, guessing that it was probably 1 in a million.

Samantha then opened two huge doors in front of her. Looking at your surroundings, something didn't seem right. Why were there so many people there? Why did Samantha take you here? Why were there so many tables?....You gagged in horror as you saw the people with food on their trays. Samantha got a bowl of macaroni and sat down at a table by herself. Only now had you realized that she took you here to eat you!

You looked at the view below you. The cheesy macaroni sat still, looking ominous. You couldn't die now; after all, who wants to be eaten by a complete stranger?! You tried jumping onto the table to make a run for it, but Samantha caught you in mid-air. "Not so fast. You're not going anywhere." Her stomach rumbled. "Well, except in there." She smirked and plopped you into the macaroni, stirring you around. She scooped up a spoonful and sent it to her waiting mouth. You could see her cheeks chewing. She teased you of your fate as she moaned in delight. "Oh, that tastes so good." She then got another spoonful with you on it! You were flying at high speeds toward her cavernous mouth.

Was this the end?
11212121.title: To the Cafeteria

112121211.content:
Your tiny voice yelled as she shoved you in. Her giant snake-like tongue immediately greeted you. With her mouth closed, the giant tongue pushed you against the walls, tasting you. Samantha moaned, loving your taste. Unfortunately, she didn't seem to want to swallow you whole. She pushed you on top of her teeth.

"No, please!" You pleaded, as her giant teeth crushed you. Samantha chewed you up a bit more until both of your arms came off. You were weak and tired. You were forced to watch her swallow your arms, but keep the rest of you in her mouth. The pain continued, until she decided to finish you. She gulped you down and gave a satisfied sigh. The trip down her throat was slow and didn't feel very good. Once you landed in her belly, the stomach acids got to work. The last thing you heard was a cruel laughter, and a burp.
112121211.title: Not going down painless

11212122.content:
Sam couldn't believe his misfortune. As he was being taken to Samantha's office, his mind was conjuring an escape. However, instead of planning, Sam starting napping. About a half hour later, Sam was awoken by the slamming of a door. What he saw was a college student, obviously upset and totally beautiful, confronting Samantha Harris. The student had black hair, blue eyes, a great bust, looked around 21 and had a fierce attitude. Sam thought this was a great time to try to escape. Ever so slightly, he made his way unto the floor and headed towards the door. All of the sudden he froze as Samantha stopped talking.

Was Sam Spotted?
11212122.title: Student Affairs

1122.content: "I'll let the machine take that," Nora said with a fiendish grin on her angelic face, "Now where was I? Oh yes, I remember now." Nora brought the sandwich back to her blood red lips and slowly brought them over Sam. He felt the humidity of her cavernous maw hit him right away . Sam heard her teeth bite down behind him and he knew that he would soon be in the belly of the beauty. Nora slowly chewed and Sam was able to avoid her crushing molars. Yet Sam was not able to escape the next part. Nora swallowed and Sam was dragged down her throat and landed in her stomach. Sam was not afraid though, as he knew he would forever be with his girlfriend, Nora. "Well, Sam," Nora said in a satisfied tone, "turns out I was always right, you are sweet." With that comment Nora left the apartment like nothing had happened and no one ever found out what happened to Sam.
1122.title: Eternity With Nora

12.content:
Sam recognized the female to be Tiffany, the 27 year old landlord with fire red hair, and ice blue eyes. She was making her weekly rounds, checking on all the apartments. Sam tried to get her attention, but when she did not notice he made his way over to her purse which she had set down while she looked around. Sam climbed inside and made himself comfortable.

Hours later light pierced the darkness as Tiffany opened her purse, Sam waved his arms and Tiffany noticed him. She wrapped her hand around him and placed him on her desk. "What do we have here?" she asked. Sam tried to tell her what happened but Tiffany was already thinking up ways to prevent the press from finding out a tenant had shrunk. She had narrowed it down to four choices and she told Sam each one. She could take him home with her and get rid of him there, give him to one of the tenants, drop him off at a restaurant, or give him to her 23 year old cousin in Grad-School. Tiffany pondered each decision and then decided.

What did she decide?
12.title: Paying Rent (On Life)

121.content:
"You are coming home with me." Amanda told Sam. She then placed Sam back in her purse and carried on with the workday. Sam fell asleep in the purse and many hours later Amanda opened the purse. "Wake up, little guy." Amanda ordered, "I am hungry and you are going to fix me dinner." Sam didn't like the sound of that. Amanda read the look on Sam's face and reaffirmed his fears, "Yes, I am going to eat you, no doubt about that. The only question is how I am going to do it. Well, I'll let you decide since you are going to be in it, what do you want for dinner?" Sam carefully thought about this question and tried to choose the food that gave him the best chance of escape or survival. He noticed Amanda was getting impatient and announced his decision.

What kind of food did Sam decide.
121.title: Having A Guest For Dinner

122.content:
"I think letting a tenant take care of you would be the best idea." Tiffany decided," Now the question is who do you want to have you?" Sam thought hard about it, since he was new to the building he didn't quite know names but he knew a couple of girl's apartment numbers. The first tenant to come to his mind was a blonde headed beauty with a really fit body, she seemed to be around 23 and lived in apartment 32A. The next tenant Sam thought about was a black haired bombshell with an excellent chest, a tight butt, and the body of a 25 year old, she lived in apartment 12B. Right when Sam was going to decide he remembered the red haired goddess with a body that turned heads, she seemed to be around 22 and lived right across the hall from Sam in apartment 23B. Sam had to decide between these three potential caretakers. The choice was a hard one but he finally made it.

Which door did Sam pick?
122.title: Choosing A Door Number

choices: Don't get rid of me, then just hide me for a while
1222.content:
Sam described the tenant to Tiffany and she knew exactly who Sam was talking about. "You mean Alexandra. Excellent choice!." she said in approval. Tiffany buzzed Alexandra up to her office and a couple a minutes later she came through the door. Tiffany explained the situation to Alexandra and then proceeded to hand Sam over. Alexandra left Tiffany's office, went back to her apartment and told Sam the situation. "Tiffany told me I have to get rid of you." she began, "I really don't want to but if I don't I'll be evicted. So how do you want me to get rid of you?" Sam thought about this and responded.

How did Sam respond?
1222.title: The Gift That Keeps On Giving

123.content:
"The best way to get rid of the evidence," Tiffany said, "would be to drop him off at a restaurant." Sam became scared as Tiffany placed him in her cleavage and got in her car to find the right restaurant. As Tiffany drove down the main road she suggested many different possibilities to Sam. Sam didn't like any of them but he had no choice at this point. The ones Sam was really interested in were the deli/sub shop, the pizza parlor, and the hamburger stand. "You see anything you like?" Tiffany asked him.

Where did Sam decide?
123.title: Picking A Place To Eat....You

1232.content: Tiffinay drove over to the pizza parlor and snuck in without being noticed,she dropped sam on the floor and left. Sam looked around to see the place was packed with customers,just then a tall waitress came stomping over and sam quickly jumped on her high heeled shoes. She went into the kitchen to get a pizza and sam jumped off her shoe,the waitress forgot something and walked away,sam climbed the counter and made his way onto the pizza and hid under the cheese,the sauce was hot and strong,he heard stomping footsteps and rose his head up to to see the waiter coming "mmmm,you know that pizza justs looks so delicous,I'll just tell the cusomers that one of the slices fell on the ground" she picked up the slice that sam was hiding in and see that he was headed to puprle lipsticked mouth,just then............
1232.title: Pizza Parlor

1233.content:
Tiffany pulled into the Hamburger Stand's parking lot and proceeded to walk inside with Sam in hand. She walked up to the register to order a side of fries and as the cashier turned away Tiffany through Sam over the counter and right into the pile of hamburger buns in the kitchen. Sam didn't have much time to relax as the hand of one the the employees reached into the bin and grabbed Sam along with the hamburger bun. She placed the bun (and Sam) on the preparation table and then froze for a second.

Why did she freeze?
1233.title: Sam's Last Stand

12331.content: The employee was about to place the patty on the bun, but stopped as soon as she saw a miniscule figure on the bun. She immediately snatched him up with a latex gloved hand and eyed him curiously. She soon realized that he was a human and should not be thrown away. Thinking quickly, she stuffed him away in her ________ . She would never know that the employee had stolen him away now.
12331.title: She Saw Sam

choices: Sam wants to grab something to eat
Sam wants to stop by the College Science Lab
Sam wants to meet Kimberly's friends
124.content:
"I think you should get to know my cousin, Kimberly." Tiffany said. She placed Sam in her purse and drove over to Kimberly's apartment just off the college grounds. Tiffany knocked on Kimberly's door and she answered. "Hey cousin!," Kimberly said, "What brings you over here?" Tiffany opened her purse and placed Sam on the kitchen counter "This is why I am here." Tiffany said. Tiffany told Kimberly what she wanted her to do and Kimberly nodded in acknowledgment. Tiffany left the apartment and Kimberly turned to Sam. "Looks like you are with me now, little guy." Kimberly said, "What do you want to do today? I don't have classes for about two hours." Sam thought about it and then told her what he wanted to do.

What did he decide?
124.title: Your Mission If You Choose To Accept It

choices: Ask Heather to stay with him
Ask Heather to drop him off with Kerri
13.content:
As the figure entered the room Sam could make her out to be Heather. "Sam, you home?" she called out. Sam tried to get her attention and out of pure luck, it worked. "Sam, what happened to you?" Heather asked as she picked him up off the floor. Sam told her everything and asked for her help. "I would love to help you but I have a party to go to tonight," she said, "unless you want to come along. Or I could not go and we could hang out like we used to. No, I got it, I could leave you with my room mate, Kerri, and go to the party. What do you think?" Sam thought over all his choices and carefully decided.

What did Sam decide?
13.title: Big Sister

131.content:
Sam decided that he wanted to go to the party with Heather. "Fine then," Heather said, "you can come." She placed Sam in her cleavage and made her way to the party. The party was for Heather's friend Susan, she had black hair, green eyes a great body and was about 23 years old. When Sam and Heather arrived, Heather told Sam to stay still and be careful. There were many people at the party along with good food, and dancing. But while Heather was dancing Sam was jarred loose and flew across the room over to the food table.

Where did he land?
131.title: Party Time!

1311.content: As he landed in the dip, Sam immediately started paddling to try to get out, but the dip was very viscous and it was almost impossible. Suddenly a chip appeared from above. He managed to dodge it, but more and more chips started appearing and it became very hard to avoid them. Suddenly one chip scooped him up in it! He looked to see the hungry face of...
1311.title: In the chip dip

1312.content: At first, you figured you could get out of the bun pretty easily. After all, it was only bread. Just then, you saw out of the corner of your eye a girl carrying in hot dogs from the grill. Everyone got a fork and grabbed a bun. Unfortunately you couldn't get out of the bun fast enough, and soon you felt a huge hot dog falling on you. Next, you got drenched in a rain of catsup and mustard. Looking out to see a giant mouth, you saw it belonged to...
1312.title: Among assorted buns

13122.content:
Sam saw that the pair of crimson lips he was now faced with belonged to Susan. He tried to get free but the condiments made any grip Sam may have had too slippery. Sam then tried to get Susan's attention. Sam wasn't at the front of the hot dog but he still wanted to be free as soon as possible. He yelled to the top of his lungs, yet to no avail. Susan took her first bite just barely missing Sam. Sam was going to be in the next bite and knew he had to be discovered or he was dead. Sam waved his arms and as Susan came in for her next bite, she stopped for a second.

Did Susan See Sam?
13122.title: Wiener or Loser

131221.content: Suddenly Susan saw something wriggling in her hot dog. Her first instinct, naturally, was to think that Sam was a bug. When she saw him in the wiener bun, she almost vomited. She dropped the food on the floor and went to the trash can for a second. This sudden impact on the floor allowed Sam to escape from the hot dog. However, a new challenge faced him, for immediately after he got out, he looked up and saw...
131221.title: Yes

1312212.content:
Sam saw Susan's boot and he ran to the pile of purses over by the door. He had no time to find one so he just jumped in the closest one. To his luck Susan wasn't as fast as him and he had escaped. Sam decided to sleep for a while until the owner of this purse came back. A couple of hours later Sam awoke to see a female face. The face looked familiar but Sam couldn't remember who it was.

Whose Purse Was Sam In?
1312212.title: Run For Your Life

choices: A giant black gloved hand (Susan knows he's in there)
A giant boot (Susan is still unaware)
13122122.content:
Sam did not have enough time while escaping to find out which purse it was that he had jumped into. He did not know that the purse was so crowded, and got trapped between a cell phone and a pocketbook, and couldn't get out. By the time he had wiggled up an inch, the party was over and Susan had just picked it up while going home.

Sam was jostled around as Susan carried the purse back to her car, and he still was stuck in there. As he tried to wiggle out, he only got out as soon as Susan got home. He clambered out of the purse to get out of the house, for he knew that Susan couldn't be entirely trusted with your well-being. As soon as he leaped off the purse, he saw something moving towards him. It was...
13122122.title: Susan's

1313.content: Propelled by Heather's insanely energetic dancing, Sam flew out and landed in a very cold surface. Susan had just brought it out of the fridge and put it on the table, where he landed. He struggled to get out, since it was so slippery and cold, almost like...yes, ice. Suddenly a huge scooper appeared from above and he was soon dropped into a bowl. Looking up from the ice cream, he saw the face of...
1313.title: In the ice cream

choices: Nowhere. Heather goes back and retrieves Sam
132.content:
Sam begged Heather to stay with him and cancel her plans at the party. Heather reluctantly agreed and made the phone call. Heather returned and told Sam that they were going to go to the mall to pick out some new clothes for Sam since he shrunk out of his old ones. Heather placed Sam in her cleavage, left the apartment and headed off towards the mall. Heather arrived at the mall and as soon as she entered was strongly bumped into by another shopper. The bump was enough to free Sam from Heather's cleavage. Now Sam was alone in the mall. He had to find some help.

Where did Sam go for help?
132.title: Big Mall Small Sam

choices: 20 year old blonde girl going to Subway
26 year old brunette lady going to Taco Bell
30 year old African-American lady going to McDonald's
1321.content: The food court was closest by where Sam had been bumped off of Heather, so he figured he should just try to get help here. He went to the first table he could see when all of a sudden a giant brown boot slammed down in front of him. Taking the opportunity, he grabbed onto the leathery heel just before it lifted again, and was now riding the lady's boot. He looked up and saw it was a...
1321.title: The Food Court

choices: For the 20 year old blonde that made the sandwich
13211.content:
Sam had hitched a ride on a Subway employee's boot and now she was returning back to work. Sam began to climb up the giant blonde when all of the sudden a wind blows Sam off the blonde's pant leg and into the air. Sam eventually landed but he landed in the lettuce bin. Sam tried to escape but the blonde's hand came down grabbing some lettuce as well as Sam. She put the lettuce on the sub sandwich she was making. She then added tomato, cheese, pickle, vinegar, some peppers and spread the top half of the sub roll with mustard before she closed the sandwich. The weight was too much and Sam couldn't escape. He then felt the sandwich move.

Who was the sandwich made for?
13211.title: Does The Sam Cost Extra?

choices: She doesn't want the rest of the sandwich, and gives it to her friend Desiree
132111.content: Although Sam couldn't see her, the woman who had ordered the sandwich was a 25 year old Colombian who was on her lunch break. She was very hungry and did not pause to check her sandwich for anything suspicious because she was in a hurry. She immediately started chowing down the sub. Sam tried his best to escape out of the greens, but the sandwich had been made tightly, and the woman's tight grip always prevented him. Soon, she was close to finishing the meal and Sam had not been yet devoured, yet his time seemed near and inevitable. Just before the woman took the bite that would end his time...
132111.title: A customer

choices: Shut the door and procced to give the box to the customer
Slowly slip Sam in her pocket
1322.content:
Sam decided the best way to find help would be to head into the kitchen goods store near by. He made his way into the store and found it difficult to avoid feet so he climbed up the nearest set of shelves. Sam climbed the shelves but the breeze caused by passing shoppers made it incredibly difficult to maintain his hold and he fell into one of the bread boxes the store had on sale. As he fell he tried to grab a hold of the shelf again but all he did was pull down the door of the bread box behind him. Now trapped in the bread box, Sam decided just to take a nap. Not too long after, Sam was awoken, someone had picked up the bread box. Sam tried to make himself noticed by any means possible. Finally the door to the bread box was opened and the female saw Sam and was in shock. The female worked at the store and was speechless. A few moments late she acted.

What did the store clerk do?
1322.title: Buy One Get Sam Free

13221.content:
"Excuse me miss, but I would like to buy that bread box," you heard a female customer say. She sounded about 24, and she was trying to be as polite as possible. The clerk had then made up her mind that what she saw wasn't real, and that she had to carry on with her job as usual. Sam tried to stand up and tell her not to leave him, but it didn't work and the box was closed. Then the clerk gave the box to the 24 year old, who paid for it and took it to their apartment.

Whose Bag did Sam get in?
152111.title: That's the way the ball bounces

choices: Go do something. Sam is bored
1521112.content:
It wasn't until the soccer bag was zipped did Sam realize that he was in the wrong bag. There was nothing he could do now and instead of worrying, Sam decided to take a nap. About a half hour later light flooded the athletic bag was Maria unzipped it. Maria couldn't believe that there was an actually tiny person in her bag. With a swift move of her hand, Sam was now snugly in between Maria's breasts, still asleep. It wasn't until the smell of aromatic perfume filled his nose, did Sam finally wake up. "Look who's awake," Maria said with a grin, "Who are you?" Sam told her his entire story but she didn't look enthused. "Tell you what," she said, "How about you forget all about Emily and let me take care of you?" Sam thought about this enticing offer and decided it was worth it. "I'm so glad to hear that!" Maria exclaimed, "Now what do you want to do first, pet?" Sam stood in shock. "That's right," Maria confirmed, "I said pet. Did you think I was going to treat you as a real person? Yeah right. You are my pet, and my servant. You disobey and you shall be my food. Understood?" Sam nodded as he cowered in fear. "Now what shall we do?" Maria asked again.

What did Sam suggest?
1521112.title: A Prize Inside

info.brief_description: Sam shrinks at his apartment now females want to eat him. Please add for GPs
info.description:
Before we get into the story we need to lay some rules.

1. No males or shrunken people in the story other than Sam.
2. New characters are allowed but must be original.
3. No animals
4. This is a vore story. Sam is to be eaten eventually. Eaten in food items is preferred i.e. sandwich, burger, salad, pizza, etc.
5. Once Sam is shrunk there is no more size change.
6. Please no one sentence additions, please type at least five sentences and use proper spelling.
7. Please keep panty stuff to a minimum
8. If you add a new character keep her between 20-31 years old.
9. Be descriptive in your additions

Have fun and enjoy!
